root.name: SATAZIUS
root.description: PlotThe game takes place in the year 2051 on a planet called SATAZIUS. The cruiser named Agano was patrolling the nearby space territory of the titular planet when the cruiser was attacked by space pirates that intended to steal the assault ship "Trafalgar" that was stored aboard the ship Agano. When the crew of the Agano calculate the odds of surviving the attack via escape or retaliation they realize the only course of action is to return fire.PC System RequirementsOS: Windows 2000/XP/Windows 7Processor: Pentium III 1GHz or betterMemory: 256MB or betterGraphics: NDIVIA Geforce series, AMD(ATI) Radeon seriesDirectX®: DirectX®8 or laterHard Drive: 309 MB free hard drive space
